      • delete

        @RequestMapping(value="/delete")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String delete(com.certificateQuery.model.WorkBeanList workBeanList)
        delete a list fo works url="/delete" if there are several data will be deleted, change works[0] to works[1], works[2].....and so on works[0].year
        works[0].month works[0].area works[0].level works[0].workId works[0].workName works[0].student1 works[0].student1Id works[0].student2 works[0].student2Id works[0].student3 works[0].student3Id works[0].teacher1 works[0].teacher1Id works[0].teacher2 works[0].teacher2Id
        返回:
        json
        success:{"result":"true"}
        fail:{"result":"false"}
